plurals.name: show_dev_countdown
plurals.item: %1$d more steps to enter developer mode
%1$d more steps to enter developer mode

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d letters.
Password must contain at least 1 letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d lower-case letters.
Password must contain at least 1 lower-case letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d upper-case letters.
Password must contain at least 1 upper-case letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d numbers.
Password must contain at least 1 number.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d special characters.
Password must contain at least 1 special character.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d non-letter characters.
Password must contain at least 1 non-letter character.

plurals.name: wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: SIM card PIN is incorrect. You have %d attempts remaining.
SIM card PIN is incorrect. You have %d attempts remaining. If you fail again, please contact your carrier for help unlocking this device.

plurals.name: manage_notification_access_summary_nonzero
plurals.item: %d apps can read notifications
%d apps can read notifications

plurals.name: manage_condition_providers_summary_nonzero
plurals.item: %d apps provide conditions
%d apps provide conditions
